name: MEC Cascade Mitts - Unisex
description:
Old school looks meet new school function. Sweater-textured fleece gives the Cascade the appearance of a traditional boiled wool mitt. Use it on its own or as a heavy-weight liner under a shell.Brushed polyester fleece with a heathered finish.100g Hyperloft synthetic insulation (50% recycled content) on backs.Microfleece lining.Silicone palm and thumb provide grip on poles or coffee mugs.

        Sustainability
